subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carey Price made 38 saves for his second shutout of the season and Bryan Smolinski and Saku Koivu scored in the first period Tuesday night for the Montreal Canadiens in a 4-0 victory over the visiting Devils.
snippet: Carey Price made 38 saves for his second shutout of the season and Bryan Smolinski and Saku Koivu scored in the first period Tuesday night for the Montreal Canadiens in a 4-0 victory over the visiting Devils.
